name: get_values_at_timestamp
title: Get Position at Timestamp
description: Return the interpolated positions at the time closest to the provided timestamp

inputs.name: tpoints_col
inputs.title: Trajectory points column
inputs.description: Column containing the points for each trajectory

inputs.name: timestamp
inputs.title: Timestamp
inputs.description: The timestamp to get the position at
inputs.helper: The timestamp must be in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the interpolated positions
